note.p: German-born American physician. Studied medicine in Göttingen, 1852–7. Came to New York from Karlsruhe before 1861. Corresponding secretary of the New York Liberal Club in the 1870s. Coroner of New York from 1898.
Frank Hoeber, 2011, Hoeber: a family over three centuries, hoebers.wordpress.com/tag/emil-hoeber/ (accessed 20 December 2013); letter from D. T. Gardner, 13 August 1874.
